Uses of Interface
SocialDynamicsOfScience.ISDoS

    • Uses of ISDoS in SocialDynamicsOfScience

      Classes in SocialDynamicsOfScience that implement ISDoS 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Author
      Author is acting agent in simulation.
      class  Community
      Community - Community is a cluster of authors.
      class  Discipline
      Discipline represents scientific discipline which is related with author and papers.
      class  Paper
      Paper is relation between authors, edge between authors in co-authorship network.
      class  SocialDynamicsOfScienceSimulator
      Context Simulator for Simulation.
      Methods in SocialDynamicsOfScience that return types with arguments of type ISDoS

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      repast.simphony.context.Context<ISDoS> SocialDynamicsOfScienceBuilder.build(repast.simphony.context.Context<ISDoS> context) 
      void Paper.decideDiscipline(repast.simphony.context.Context<ISDoS> context)
      We propose a simple mechanism to model knowledge diffusion through collaboration in SDS: when authors write a paper together, they all contribute their knowledge.
